description:
Takumi, a gifted chef, was just let go from his job. He lands a gig at an old boarding house called Astro-sou, but hesitates to accept after learning he must also live there full-time. That is until he meets the beautiful and charming caretaker, Mira, and he’s sold. The two begin to work together and their connection deepens. But Mira has a secret: she isn’t from this world!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

name.native: ショーイン・ジンジャー

node.description:
[Website](https://furihataai.jp/) | [Agency (Office-tb)](office-tb.com/furihata_ai/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/furihata_ai) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/furihatagram/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWfhLoV53Rwdc9WGw735IUg)

Her nicknames are "Aiai" and "Furirin". She voices Ruby Kurosawa in Love Live! Sunshine!!. She takes the center position during shows involving the first years.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yama_ic)

Yamashita is one of the key figures of the "Web Generation," being among the first to be recruited within the industry not after formal training but after demonstrating his talent by posting animated gifs online.

His first time standing out of the crowd was on [Birdy the Mighty Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/Birdy-the-Mighty-Decode/). His animation favors expression above all else, to the point characters often bend out of shape when exposed to extreme forces and speeds. 

Despite this he still has a keen eye for delicate and realistic character animation, inspired by the likes of [Norio Matsumoto](https://anilist.co/staff/100991/Norio-Matsumoto), as demonstrated on both EDs for Birdy the Mighty Decode and [Shinsekai yori](https://anilist.co/anime/13125/From-the-New-World/) where he handled all aspects of the animation production. 

He is also adept in post production work, often handling the photography, coloring and even CG in his own works.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yama_ic)

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Website](http://uchidamaaya.jp/) | [Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=26) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/maaya_taso) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/uchidamaayataso/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJFEXIRB6DP_2FQJzv7pbXg)

Maaya Uchida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer who works for I'm Enterprise. She is [Yuuma Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/119617/)'s older sister.

**Awards:**
- She won the Best New Actress Award at the 8th Seiyuu Awards, for her role as [Hajime Ichinose](https://anilist.co/character/85153/).

**Non anime roles:**
- [Fischl](https://anilist.co/character/209685/Fischl) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Ichihime](https://anilist.co/character/200348/Ichihime) - Mahjong Soul (VG)
- Pure Vanilla Cookie - Cookie Run: Kingdom (VG)
- Admi - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Epinel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Ms. NewBabel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
- Gretel - SINoAlice (VG)
- Sakura - Shinobi Nightmare (VG)
- Kanami - Strinova (VG)
- S-Sha - Megadimension Neptunia VII (VG)
- Zero - Drakengard 3 (VG)
- Hiroyo Hakase - Hikōnin Sentai Akibaranger (Super Sentai)

__Height:__ 169.6cm (5"7')
__Agent:__ 81 Produce

__[Website](https://www.saitosoma.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/somasaito/) | [Profile (81produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%95%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E6%96%89%E8%97%A4%E3%80%80%E5%A3%AE%E9%A6%AC&id=47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SomaStaff)__

He started his singing career in 2017. Named Best Rookie Actor at the 9th Seiyu Awards (2015) and won the Singing Award at the 16th Seiyu Awards (2021).

**Non-anime roles:**
~!• [Chongyun](https://anilist.co/character/233899/Chongyun) - Genshin Impact (VG)!~
